title: legaue of legnds porgram
body: Has anyone came cross the problem where the league of legends program is running more than once in there task manager ? it's a newly developed problem for me. When I open up league my client it has no problems everything runs smooth , but when I'm in game sometimes I drop fps.. so I tried to reinstall league and tried the repair both twice nothing changed , so I opened up task manger to see if something other my league was running.. Turns out my league was running four different times and when I close one of them they all close. I'm sure how to fix this problem ? any ideeas would help !

replies.body:
No worries, it is actually normal for there to be more than one process for League. Each of those processes are in charge of a different part of league, so if you end one of them the others crash as well. 

Since you mentioned your FPS is dropping while in game, let's see if we can fix that while we're here =D! Look over our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) for some steps you can take to improve your FPS.

Let me know how that helps.
